english.segment1: When Im all alone. And the weight of the world. Is more than I can bear on my own. When all my plans have failed. And I suffered defeat. Im down on my knees. I cant get to my feet
english.segment2: Your love breaks through. And reminds me of the hope that I have in You. That I have in You
english.segment3: Chorus: Theres no other place. That Id rather be. Than safe in the arms. The arms of my Savior. Theres no other place. Where I can be free. So I run to the arms. The arms of my Savior
english.segment4: When Im feeling overwhelmed. Like I cant take anymore. Ive thrown up my hands. All I see is the floor. Ive looked to the north. The south, the west, and the east. But as far as I can see. I cant find any peace
english.segment5: Your grace breaks through. And reminds me of the hope that I have in You. That I have in You
english.segment7: Life shouldnt be something to dread. Cause I know You still know. How many hairs are in my head. And so I run to You. And so I run to You.
